org.apache.hama.commons.math

Interface DoubleMatrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DenseDoubleMatrix

    public interface DoubleMatrix
    Standard matrix interface for double elements. Every implementation should return a fresh new Matrix when operating with other elements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double NOT_FLAGGED
      Not flagged value for sparse matrices, it is default to 0.0d.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DoubleMatrix add(DoubleMatrix other)
      Adds the elements in the given matrix to the elements in this matrix.
      DoubleMatrix applyToElements(DoubleFunction fun)
      Apply a double function f(x) onto each element of the matrix.
      DoubleMatrix applyToElements(DoubleMatrix other, DoubleDoubleFunction fun)
      Apply a double double function f(x, y) onto each pair of the current matrix elements and given matrix.
      int[] columnIndices()
      Returns an array of column indices existing in this matrix.
      DoubleMatrix divide(double scalar)
      Divides each element in this matrix by the given scalar.
      DoubleMatrix divide(DoubleMatrix other)
      Validates and divides this matrix by the given other matrix.
      DoubleMatrix divide(DoubleVector vec)
      Validates and divides each element in a column by the related element in the given vector.
      DoubleMatrix divideUnsafe(DoubleMatrix other)
      Divides this matrix by the given other matrix.
      DoubleMatrix divideUnsafe(DoubleVector vec)
      Divides each element in a column by the related element in the given vector.
      double get(int row, int col)
      Get a specific value of the matrix.
      int getColumnCount()
      Returns the number of columns in the matrix.
      DoubleVector getColumnVector(int col)
      Get a whole column of the matrix as vector.
      int getRowCount()
      Returns the number of rows in this matrix.
      DoubleVector getRowVector(int row)
      Get a single row of the matrix as a vector.
      boolean isSparse()
      Returns true if the underlying implementation is sparse.
      double max(int column)
      Returns the maximum value of the given column.
      double min(int column)
      Returns the minimum value of the given column.
      DoubleMatrix multiply(double scalar)
      Multiplies this matrix (each element) with the given scalar and returns a new matrix.
      DoubleMatrix multiply(DoubleMatrix other)
      Validates the input and multiplies this matrix with the given other matrix.
      DoubleMatrix multiplyElementWise(DoubleMatrix other)
      Validates the input and multiplies this matrix per element with a given matrix.
      DoubleMatrix multiplyElementWiseUnsafe(DoubleMatrix other)
      Multiplies this matrix per element with a given matrix.
      DoubleMatrix multiplyUnsafe(DoubleMatrix other)
      Multiplies this matrix with the given other matrix.
      DoubleVector multiplyVector(DoubleVector v)
      Multiplies this matrix with a given vector v.
      DoubleVector multiplyVectorUnsafe(DoubleVector v)
      Multiplies this matrix with a given vector v.
      DoubleMatrix pow(int x)
      Pows each element by the given argument.
      void set(int row, int col, double value)
      Sets the value at the given row and column index.
      void setColumnVector(int col, DoubleVector column)
      Sets a whole column at index col with the given vector.
      void setRowVector(int rowIndex, DoubleVector row)
      Sets the whole row at index rowIndex with the given vector.
      DoubleMatrix slice(int rows, int cols)
      Slices the given matrix from 0-rows and from 0-columns.
      DoubleMatrix slice(int rowOffset, int rowMax, int colOffset, int colMax)
      Slices the given matrix from rowOffset-rowMax and from colOffset-colMax.
      DoubleMatrix subtract(double amount)
      Subtracts each element in this matrix by the given amount.
      = (matrix value - amount)
      DoubleMatrix subtract(DoubleMatrix other)
      Validates the input and subtracts this matrix by the given other matrix.
      DoubleMatrix subtract(DoubleVector vec)
      Validates and subtracts each element in a column by the related element in the given vector.
      DoubleMatrix subtractBy(double amount)
      Substracts the given amount by each element in this matrix.
      DoubleMatrix subtractUnsafe(DoubleMatrix other)
      Subtracts this matrix by the given other matrix.
      DoubleMatrix subtractUnsafe(DoubleVector vec)
      Subtracts each element in a column by the related element in the given vector.
      double sum()
      Sums all elements.
      DoubleMatrix transpose()
      Transposes this matrix.

      • NOT_FLAGGED

        static final double NOT_FLAGGED
        Not flagged value for sparse matrices, it is default to 0.0d.

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • get

        double get(int row,
         int col)
        Get a specific value of the matrix.
        Returns:
        Returns the integer value at in the column at the row.

      • getColumnCount

        int getColumnCount()
        Returns the number of columns in the matrix. Always a constant time operation.

      • getColumnVector

        DoubleVector getColumnVector(int col)
        Get a whole column of the matrix as vector.

      • getRowCount

        int getRowCount()
        Returns the number of rows in this matrix. Always a constant time operation.

        Get a single row of the matrix as a vector.

      • multiplyVectorUnsafe

        DoubleVector multiplyVectorUnsafe(DoubleVector v)
        Multiplies this matrix with a given vector v. The returning vector contains the sum of the rows.

      • multiplyVector

        DoubleVector multiplyVector(DoubleVector v)
        Multiplies this matrix with a given vector v. The returning vector contains the sum of the rows.
        Parameters:
        v - the vector
        Returns:
        a new vector with the result of the operation.

      • transpose

        DoubleMatrix transpose()
        Transposes this matrix.

      • subtractBy

        DoubleMatrix subtractBy(double amount)
        Substracts the given amount by each element in this matrix.
        = (amount - matrix value)

      • subtract

        DoubleMatrix subtract(double amount)
        Subtracts each element in this matrix by the given amount.
        = (matrix value - amount)

      • applyToElements

        DoubleMatrix applyToElements(DoubleFunction fun)
        Apply a double function f(x) onto each element of the matrix. After applying, each element of the current matrix will be changed from x to f(x).
        Parameters:
        fun - The function.
        Returns:
        The matrix itself, supply for chain operation.

      • applyToElements

        DoubleMatrix applyToElements(DoubleMatrix other,
                           DoubleDoubleFunction fun)
        Apply a double double function f(x, y) onto each pair of the current matrix elements and given matrix. After applying, each element of the current matrix will be changed from x to f(x, y).
        Parameters:
        other - The matrix contributing the second argument of the function.
        fun - The function that takes two arguments.
        Returns:
        The matrix itself, supply for chain operation.
